derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: of unknown origin

entry.tran: (撞击或擦伤所致的)红肿,条痕
entry.def: A welt is a mark which is made on someone's skin, usually by a blow from something such as a whip or sword.

example.ex: He had a reddening welt on his temple and his nose was bleeding.
example.tran: 他太阳穴处有块红肿，鼻子也在流血。

means.word_mean: 1. a raised mark on the skin (as produced by the blow of a whip); characteristic of many allergic reactions
1. beat severely with a whip or rod;
